name: Attay aur Gur ka halwa Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Attay aur Gur ka halwa Recipe: Whole flour 1 cup Jaggery 1 cup Semolina 2 tbsp Clarified butter 1 cup Cardamom powder 2 pinches Mix nuts as required Water as required
instructions: Heat clarified butter add semolina and roast well. Also add whole flour cook well. Add jaggery with 1-1/2 cup of water and cardamom powder. When done add mix nuts, serve.
